creator: Fengshi
descriptionHtml:
Craving for romance, fantasy, mystery, fan-fic web novels? Really into alpha boss, sinner wife, monarch of time, legendary hunter but already get bored of the unimaginative reading experience in current book apps? Imagine reading a novel like watching a video! This app will fulfill your need for updating trending novels and create a videolike virtual world that you won’t find anywhere else. Watch novels instead of reading novels.

-Video Novels
1.Video trailers for novels- Pick the novels you’re most interested in by discovering and watching video trailers that we create for you to enter the story before reading. A brand new experience of Watching Novels.

2.Read web novels with sounds and effects- With visualized story scenes and story-like background tracks, VNovel gives you a fresh reading experience that you never had in other reading apps. Watch novels like you are in a virtual world.

3.Alternative reading modes- Switch between various reading models easily to find the best way of reading novels

-All genres of original novels
Great original novels for both male readers and female readers. Here you will find all best original novels including: romance, fantasy, mystery, fanfiction, alpha boss, sinner wife, monarch of time, legendary hunter, hypnosis stories,tomarry stories,supreme magus and so much more!

title: VNovel - Video Novel & Web Novel & Watch Novels

creator: READFUN LIMITED
descriptionHtml:
Craving for fantasy webnovels, like werewolf and vampire stories? Enjoy reading romance and fanfiction books? Really into video novels and bored with the unimaginative reading experience on current book apps? VNovel can fulfill all you needs for updating original novels timely and create a videolike virtual world that you won’t find anywhere else. Here, you can live in the realms of fantasy with werewolves and vampires around you. You can immerse in a romance book where the alpha boss only loves you. And you can read stories involving popular fictional characters like Harry Potter.

[Video novels]
1. Video trailers for novels - Pick the webnovels you’re most interested in by watching video trailers that we make for you to enter the story world before reading.
2. Read original books with video effects and music - With visualized story scenes and story-like background tracks, VNovel gives you a brand new experience that you will never have in other apps - read webnovels like you are in a virtual world.
3. Alternative reading modes - Switch between the normal and immersion reading mode to find the best way of reading.

[All genres of original webnovels]
Best and hottest stories for both male and female book lovers. Here you will find all the
original fictions including romance, fantasy, werewolf, vampire, mystery, fanfiction, comedy, action, adventure, thriller, science, young adult, hypnosis, tomarry, supreme magus stories and so on! And if you are looking for more LGBTQ+ books, cyberpunk tales, or paranormal ebooks and teen love fiction, you can find it all on VNovel! What’s more, you’re able to discover all kinds of charismatic characters in the romance and fantasy stories, like alpha boss, CEO, billionaire, sinner wife, monarch of time, wolf king, vampire prince, legendary hunter, and etc..


[How To Contact Us]
- For Your Opinions｜We’d like to hear from you with appreciation
1. Customer Service Email —>> support@vnovel.us

Follow Us | VNovel Social Media
1. Official Website —>> https://www.vnovel.us/
2. Facebook —>> https://business.facebook.com/VNovel-Webnovels-Fun-103085035341194/
